title: Skye Blue
description:
Sometimes, the road to happily ever after takes you where you least expect it.Skye was only interested in finally losing his virginity, but he might have found much more than that. Two guys both feel so right to the twenty-one-year old art student, but maybe that means they cancel each other out. After all, if either was the one, Skye wouldnâ€™t have feelings for both of them. Would he?But what if he really did just meet the love of his life?Note: This male/male erotic romance includes explicit language and graphic sex. For 
adult readers only!
 Though this is the 6th book in the series, it may also be read as a stand-alone.
author: Alexa Land
